Accomplishment Report
(A.Y. 2021 - 2022)

(FAME)Society

Republic of the Philippines CAVITE STATE UNIVERSITY Tanza Campus Ph. 2, Bahay Katuparan, Bagtas, Tanza, Cavite (046) 414-3979 www.cvsu.edu.ph

From Art we Make Expressions (FAME) Society LOGO MAKING CONTEST
FAME Society Annual Christmas Caroling #FAMEShares: FAMESKONG HANDOG 2021
PJMA: Juan Big Idea Nationwide 2022 “Trends in the New MIllenium”
“FAME-Uno” FAME Top Student of the 1st Semester

FAME SOCIETY 2021 - 2022 The Future Administrators, Managers, and Executives (FAME) Society which
encompasses all business students conducted several activities during Academic Year 2020- 2021. The following activities below were accomplished by the organization:
● From Art we Make Expressions (FAME) Society LOGO MAKING CONTEST
This year the Future Administrators, Managers and Executives Society came up with fresh new ideas that will convey the talents and skills of the Business Management students
of Cavite State University - Tanza Campus. Starting with this activity, the FAME Society Logo Making Contest in which all the participants had sent their entries till the 19th of November 19,
2021. All the participants must follow the mechanics that were announced in the organization’s facebook page. The contest was also judged by the advisers of the organization and the department. Last November 22, 2021, FAME Society announced the winner of this activity
which is Ms. Aira Angella Abejar from BSBM 3-3. Out of fifteen entries her work was chosen to be the grand winner with this she received a 500 pesos worth of E-load and a certificate of recognition.
● FAME Society Annual Christmas Caroling #FAMEShares: FAMESKONG HANDOG 2021
This year the FAME Society continued the yearly Christmas caroling that became a
custom for the organization. With the pandemic still going on, the organization decided to continue the virtual caroling like what they've done last year. Together with the officers, they
serenade the netizens with the song from the abs-cbn station’s christmas ID entitled “Andito tayo para sa isa’t isa”. All the proceeds of this activity funded the FAMESKONG HANDOG Bayong containing Christmas goodies. These bayongs were given to chosen families residing
from Brgy. Bagtas, Tanza, Cavite.
● PJMA: Juan Big Idea Nationwide 2022 “The Great Reset of Innovative Trends in the New Millennium”
As part and member school of the organization Philippine Junior Marketing Association, the FAME Society was invited to their annual event called JUAN BIG IDEA NATIONWIDE 2022. This year the theme of the event was The Great Reset of Innovative Trends in the New
Millennium, in which they invited different kinds of people that are well-known and skilled in the business industry. By this the students who joined this event can be inspired and learned
about the topics discussed. One of the guest speaker Mr. Marvin Lim from Mega Global talks

about how their company bounced back from this pandemic. He talked about their company’s core value which is the “malasakit”. This year the organization has also accomplished a
milestone as a part of this national organization, because FAME Society is one of partners in the success of the Juan Big Idea Nationwide 2022, and received special thanks and Certificate of Partnership.
● “FAME-Uno” FAME Top Student of the 1st Semester
This semester the FAME Society acknowledged all the outstanding Business
Management students of the CvSU Tanza Campus. That’s why the officers came up with the idea of giving a small token and recognition for all of the academic achievers of the first
semester. By this the organization posted all the names of the achievers in the facebook page, together with the top 1 student of the department. Who is Ms. Alyssa Marie B. Olete, a first year student that gained a GPA of 1.00. She received a 1 month premium subscription to an
entertainment site from the FAME Society. The other top student per year also received a small gift from the organization.
Prepared by:
JERFAULYN A. GEROLLO ANGEL L. TABUA Secretary, FAME Society President, FAME Society Date prepared: June 28, 2022
Approved:
FAME Society
